original_text: The Lord said to Moses, ‘This man must die. All the people must take him outside the camp. They must throw stones at him to kill him.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 그 사람을 반드시 죽일지니 온 회중이 진영 밖에서 돌로 그를 칠지니라

sentences.original_text: All the people must take him outside the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 백성은 그를 진 밖으로 데려가야 한다

sentences.original_text: They must throw stones at him
